Desc.entry: Support and self-help group for people suffering from fibromyalgia syndrome (FMS) and chronic fatigue syndrome (CFS). Purpose of the group is for sufferers to meet and be themselves, to be motivated, be listened to and to get support from other members and group leaders. Provides information on all aspects of the condition. Provides speakers to give talks and demonstrations on complementary therapy, health and financial issues about fibromyalgia. The group attends regional meetings and conferences and has contact with other organisations. A registered charity. Self or any referral.

Pubs.entry: Information pack; Exercise sheets; Newsletter; GP information packs

ProvisionPlaceDisabledAccess.entry: Infra red hearing system, Voice synthesiser/visual display in lift, Braille plan of building

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 3rd Mon in the month 10.15am for 10.30am-12.30pm (group meetings)
